verses.verse: Woe <S%H1945><s%> unto them that decree <S%H2710><s%> unrighteous <S%H205><s%> decrees, <S%H2711><s%> and that write <S%H3789><s%> grievousness <S%H5999><s%> which they have prescribed; <S%H3789><s%>

To turn aside <S%H5186><s%> the needy <S%H1800><s%> from judgment, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1779><s%> and to take away <S%H1497><s%> the right <S%H4941><s%> from the poor <S%H6041><s%> of my people, <S%H5971><s%> that widows <S%H490><s%> may be <S%H1961><s%> their prey, <S%H7998><s%> and that they may rob <S%H962><s%> the fatherless! <S%H3490><s%>

And what <S%H4100><s%> will ye do <S%H6213><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of visitation, <S%H6486><s%> and in the desolation <S%H7722><s%> which shall come <S%H935><s%> from far? <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4801><s%> to <S%H5921><s%> whom <S%H4310><s%> will ye flee <S%H5127><s%> for help? <S%H5833><s%> and where <S%H575><s%> will ye leave <S%H5800><s%> your glory? <S%H3519><s%>

Without <S%H1115><s%> me they shall bow down <S%H3766><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the prisoners, <S%H616><s%> and they shall fall <S%H5307><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the slain. <S%H2026><s%> For all <S%H3605><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> his anger <S%H639><s%> is not <S%H3808><s%> turned away, <S%H7725><s%> but his hand <S%H3027><s%> is stretched out <S%H5186><s%> still. <S%H5750><s%>
O Assyrian, <S%H804><s%> the rod <S%H7626><s%> of mine anger, <S%H639><s%> and the staff <S%H4294><s%> in their hand <S%H3027><s%> is mine indignation. <S%H2195><s%>

I will send <S%H7971><s%> him against a hypocritical <S%H2611><s%> nation, <S%H1471><s%> and against <S%H5921><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> of my wrath <S%H5678><s%> will I give him a charge, <S%H6680><s%> to take <S%H7997><s%> the spoil, <S%H7998><s%> and to take <S%H962><s%> the prey, <S%H957><s%> and to tread them down <S%H4823><s%> like the mire <S%H2563><s%> of the streets. <S%H2351><s%>

Howbeit he <S%H1931><s%> meaneth <S%H1819><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> so, <S%H3651><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> doth his heart <S%H3824><s%> think <S%H2803><s%> so; <S%H3651><s%> but <S%H3588><s%> it is in his heart <S%H3824><s%> to destroy <S%H8045><s%> and cut off <S%H3772><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> a few. <S%H4592><s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> he saith, <S%H559><s%> Are not <S%H3808><s%> my princes <S%H8269><s%> altogether <S%H3162><s%> kings? <S%H4428><s%>

Is not <S%H3808><s%> Calno <S%H3641><s%> as Carchemish? <S%H3751><s%> is not <S%H3808><s%> Hamath <S%H2574><s%> as Arpad? <S%H774><s%> is not <S%H3808><s%> Samaria <S%H8111><s%> as Damascus? <S%H1834><s%>

As <S%H834><s%> my hand <S%H3027><s%> hath found <S%H4672><s%> the kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> of the idols, <S%H457><s%> and whose graven images <S%H6456><s%> did excel them of Jerusalem <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3389><s%> and of Samaria; <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8111><s%>

Shall I not, <S%H3808><s%> as <S%H834><s%> I have done <S%H6213><s%> unto Samaria <S%H8111><s%> and her idols, <S%H457><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> to Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> and her idols? <S%H6091><s%>

Wherefore it shall come to pass, <S%H1961><s%> that when <S%H3588><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> hath performed <S%H1214><s%> his <S%H853><s%> whole <S%H3605><s%> work <S%H4639><s%> upon mount <S%H2022><s%> Zion <S%H6726><s%> and on Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> I will punish <S%H6485><s%> <S%H5921><s%> the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of the stout <S%H1433><s%> heart <S%H3824><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Assyria, <S%H804><s%> and <S%H5921><s%> the glory <S%H8597><s%> of his high <S%H7312><s%> looks. <S%H5869><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> he saith, <S%H559><s%> By the strength <S%H3581><s%> of my hand <S%H3027><s%> I have done <S%H6213><s%> it, and by my wisdom; <S%H2451><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> I am prudent: <S%H995><s%> and I have removed <S%H5493><s%> the bounds <S%H1367><s%> of the people, <S%H5971><s%> and have robbed <S%H8154><s%> their treasures, <S%H6259><s%> and I have put down <S%H3381><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> like a valiant <S%H47><s%> man:

And my hand <S%H3027><s%> hath found <S%H4672><s%> as a nest <S%H7064><s%> the riches <S%H2428><s%> of the people: <S%H5971><s%> and as one gathereth <S%H622><s%> eggs <S%H1000><s%> that are left, <S%H5800><s%> have I <S%H589><s%> gathered <S%H622><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the earth; <S%H776><s%> and there was <S%H1961><s%> none <S%H3808><s%> that moved <S%H5074><s%> the wing, <S%H3671><s%> or opened <S%H6475><s%> the mouth, <S%H6310><s%> or peeped. <S%H6850><s%>

Shall the axe <S%H1631><s%> boast itself <S%H6286><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> him that heweth <S%H2672><s%> therewith? or shall the saw <S%H4883><s%> magnify itself <S%H1431><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> him that shaketh <S%H5130><s%> it? as if the rod <S%H7626><s%> should shake itself against <S%H5130><s%> <S%H853><s%> them that lift it up, <S%H7311><s%> or as if the staff <S%H4294><s%> should lift up <S%H7311><s%> itself, as if it were no <S%H3808><s%> wood. <S%H6086><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> shall the Lord, <S%H113><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> send <S%H7971><s%> among his fat ones <S%H4924><s%> leanness; <S%H7332><s%> and under <S%H8478><s%> his glory <S%H3519><s%> he shall kindle <S%H3344><s%> a burning <S%H3350><s%> like the burning <S%H3350><s%> of a fire. <S%H784><s%>

And the light <S%H216><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> for a fire, <S%H784><s%> and his Holy One <S%H6918><s%> for a flame: <S%H3852><s%> and it shall burn <S%H1197><s%> and devour <S%H398><s%> his thorns <S%H7898><s%> and his briers <S%H8068><s%> in one <S%H259><s%> day; <S%H3117><s%>

And shall consume <S%H3615><s%> the glory <S%H3519><s%> of his forest, <S%H3293><s%> and of his fruitful field, <S%H3759><s%> both soul <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5315><s%> and body: <S%H1320><s%> and they shall be <S%H1961><s%> as when a standard-bearer <S%H5263><s%> fainteth. <S%H4549><s%>
And the rest <S%H7605><s%> of the trees <S%H6086><s%> of his forest <S%H3293><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> few, <S%H4557><s%> that a child <S%H5288><s%> may write <S%H3789><s%> them.

And it shall come to pass <S%H1961><s%> in that <S%H1931><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> that the remnant <S%H7605><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and such as are escaped <S%H6413><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> shall no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> again <S%H3254><s%> stay <S%H8172><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> him that smote <S%H5221><s%> them; but shall stay <S%H8172><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> the Holy One <S%H6918><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> in truth. <S%H571><s%>
The remnant <S%H7605><s%> shall return, <S%H7725><s%> even the remnant <S%H7605><s%> of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the mighty <S%H1368><s%> God. <S%H410><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> though <S%H518><s%> thy people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> be <S%H1961><s%> as the sand <S%H2344><s%> of the sea, <S%H3220><s%> yet a remnant <S%H7605><s%> of them shall return: <S%H7725><s%> the consumption <S%H3631><s%> decreed <S%H2782><s%> shall overflow <S%H7857><s%> with righteousness. <S%H6666><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> shall make <S%H6213><s%> a consumption, <S%H3617><s%> even determined, <S%H2782><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the land. <S%H776><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> O my people <S%H5971><s%> that dwellest <S%H3427><s%> in Zion, <S%H6726><s%> be not <S%H408><s%> afraid <S%H3372><s%> of the Assyrian: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H804><s%> he shall smite <S%H5221><s%> thee with a rod, <S%H7626><s%> and shall lift up <S%H5375><s%> his staff <S%H4294><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> thee, after the manner <S%H1870><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> yet <S%H5750><s%> a very <S%H4213><s%> little <S%H4592><s%> while, and the indignation <S%H2195><s%> shall cease, <S%H3615><s%> and mine anger <S%H639><s%> in <S%H5921><s%> their destruction. <S%H8399><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> shall stir up <S%H5782><s%> a scourge <S%H7752><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> him according to the slaughter <S%H4347><s%> of Midian <S%H4080><s%> at the rock <S%H6697><s%> of Oreb: <S%H6159><s%> and as his rod <S%H4294><s%> was upon <S%H5921><s%> the sea, <S%H3220><s%> so shall he lift it up <S%H5375><s%> after the manner <S%H1870><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

And it shall come to pass <S%H1961><s%> in that <S%H1931><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> that his burden <S%H5448><s%> shall be taken away <S%H5493><s%> from off <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> thy shoulder, <S%H7926><s%> and his yoke <S%H5923><s%> from off <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> thy neck, <S%H6677><s%> and the yoke <S%H5923><s%> shall be destroyed <S%H2254><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the anointing. <S%H8081><s%>
He is come <S%H935><s%> to <S%H5921><s%> Aiath, <S%H5857><s%> he is passed <S%H5674><s%> to Migron; <S%H4051><s%> at Michmash <S%H4363><s%> he hath laid up <S%H6485><s%> his carriages: <S%H3627><s%>

They are gone over <S%H5674><s%> the passage: <S%H4569><s%> they have taken up their lodging <S%H4411><s%> at Geba; <S%H1387><s%> Ramah <S%H7414><s%> is afraid; <S%H2729><s%> Gibeah <S%H1390><s%> of Saul <S%H7586><s%> is fled. <S%H5127><s%>

Lift up <S%H6670><s%> thy voice, <S%H6963><s%> O daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Gallim: <S%H1554><s%> cause it to be heard <S%H7181><s%> unto Laish, <S%H3919><s%> O poor <S%H6041><s%> Anathoth. <S%H6068><s%>
Madmenah <S%H4088><s%> is removed; <S%H5074><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Gebim <S%H1374><s%> gather themselves to flee. <S%H5756><s%>

As yet <S%H5750><s%> shall he remain <S%H5975><s%> at Nob <S%H5011><s%> that day: <S%H3117><s%> he shall shake <S%H5130><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> against the mount <S%H2022><s%> of the daughter <S%H1004><s%> of Zion, <S%H6726><s%> the hill <S%H1389><s%> of Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> the Lord, <S%H113><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> shall lop <S%H5586><s%> the bough <S%H6288><s%> with terror: <S%H4637><s%> and the high ones <S%H7312><s%> of stature <S%H6967><s%> shall be hewn down, <S%H1438><s%> and the haughty <S%H1364><s%> shall be humbled. <S%H8213><s%>
And he shall cut down <S%H5362><s%> the thickets <S%H5442><s%> of the forest <S%H3293><s%> with iron, <S%H1270><s%> and Lebanon <S%H3844><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> by a mighty one. <S%H117><s%>
